performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: Thank you for participating in the university and school-based interviews. All are in agreement that whilst you were able to demonstrate excellent subject knowledge, you aren't quite ready to undertake the PGCE and would benefit from gaining an understanding of what constitutes creative teaching.  Should you wish to reapply for September 2022 then we would welcome an application from you. In the interim, we would be happy to offer two weeks of observation experience at Bonus Pastor Catholic College in the summer term. If this is of interest please contact Clare Barclay to arrange.
